metadata.title: USN-4475-1 -- Chrony vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Chrony incorrectly handled certain symbolic links. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4475-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  chrony - 3.2-4ubuntu4.5 No subscription required
